content:
Al Grim, the quartermaster, greets you warmly. "Ah. It's good to see you again!" he says. "See anything you like? No need for bartering with me. I'm no Messipian merchant! Just be sure to leave something in place of whatever you take."

Each Ranger with their   on this feature may return a gear or attachment from their hand to the collection. Then, choose a starting gear or attachment card from the collection that they meet the requirements for, and add it to their hand. (This alteration to their deck is permanent.) Discard the Plinth.
